Reviews.Title: Fuji camera
Reviews.Author: TERESA CAMPBELL
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera and i took awesome Fourth of July pictures in the park and even some good night pictures! No complaints!

Reviews.Title: exceptional camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas F Kubichek
Reviews.Content: I have owned two previous fuji cameras.  Both were excellent.  I wanted to upgrade and considered other major cameras.The HS50EXR compared well to other cameras and was half the price.The long range clarity is unbelievable.  I used it Sunday afternoon and took over 1300 pictures at a reunion.
